default.description: List of workflow specifications on successful operation

Allocate3gppService.description: This describes the request body for 3gpp service allocation

name.description: Name of the service to allocate

modelInvariantUuid.description: Model Invariant UUID corresponding to the service. For E.g :  NSST Model invariant uuid in case of NSSI creation

modelUuid.description: Model UUID corresponding to the service. For E.g :  NSST Model uuid in case of NSSI creation

subscriptionServiceType.description: Service type for the subscription. For E.G :5G

additionalProperties.description: Map of additional properties required for service allocation

DeAllocate3gppService.description: This describes the request body for 3gpp service Termination/Deallocation

serviceInstanceID.description: ID of the service to terminate

subscriptionServiceType.description: Service type for the subscription. For E.G :5G

additionalProperties.description: Map of additional properties required for service deallocation

Modify3gppService.description: This describes the request body for 3gpp service modification

name.description: Name of the service to modify

serviceInstanceID.description: ID of the service to modify

subscriptionServiceType.description: Service type for the subscription. For E.G :5G

additionalProperties.description: Map of additional properties required for service modification

3gppServiceActivation.description: This describes the request body for 3gpp service activation/deactivation

serviceInstanceID.description: ID of the service to be activated/deactivated

subscriptionServiceType.description: Service type for the subscription. For E.G :5G

additionalProperties.description: Map of additional properties required for service activation/deactivation

QuerySubnetCapability.description: This describes the subnet capabilities that can be queried

3gppServiceResponse.description: This describes the response for 3gpp services

jobId.description: Job ID to be used to identify the status of the job

statusDescription.description: Description on status in case of erroneous response

RetrievingWorkflowResponse.description: Response body of fetching workflows using resource target

artifactType.description: Type of the artifact to be queried

workflowName.description: Name of the workflow fetched for the resource type

operationName.description: Mapped operation name of the corresponding workflow

workflowResourceTarget.description: Type of Resource mapped against the workflow

ServiceLevelWorkflowExecution.description: This describes the request body of service level custom workflow execution

modelInfo.description: Parameters related to the service model

modelType.description: Type of the model to be executed

modelInvariantUuid.description: Model invariant id corresponding to the service

modelUuid.description: Model uuid corresponding to the service

modelVersionId.description: Model version of the service instance

globalSubscriberId.description: Id of the subscriber sending the request

project.description: Information about the target project name

PNFCustomWorkflowExecution.description: This describes the request body of PNF custom workflow execution

modelInfo.description: Parameters related to the service model

modelType.description: Type of the model to be executed

modelInvariantUuid.description: Model invariant id corresponding to the service

modelUuid.description: Model uuid corresponding to the service

modelVersionId.description: Model version of the service instance

globalSubscriberId.description: Id of the subscriber sending the request

project.description: Information about the target project name
